name: ChaiDOS
description:
A guy wants to download some games in the Stam, but he does not have fast Internet, his own is enough only to sweat. He corresponds with his friend from school and wonders how to download games, and his friend tells him that there is a program called Hack Tool, which allows you to hack other people's Wi-Fi. The boi likes the idea and downloads the program.

Made by 2IQ Labs team
